resume_highlights: Led Shopify-NetSuite integration at Santo Remedio

star_stories.situation: At Santo Remedio, we faced a conflict between engineering and operations during our Shopify-NetSuite rollout.
star_stories.task: I needed to resolve the tension and get the project back on track within two weeks.
star_stories.action: I set up cross-functional sprint reviews where each team explained blockers openly, then mediated by breaking problems into smaller integration tasks with clear ownership.
star_stories.result: This reduced tension, gave everyone ownership, and led to a smoother launch with order sync errors dropping by 90% within two weeks.

star_stories.situation: Our e-commerce platform was experiencing 30% cart abandonment due to slow checkout performance.
star_stories.task: I was tasked with improving checkout speed and reducing abandonment rates.
star_stories.action: I implemented database query optimization, added Redis caching, and streamlined the payment flow by removing unnecessary form fields.
star_stories.result: Checkout time decreased by 60% and cart abandonment dropped to 18%, resulting in $200K additional monthly revenue.
